Name: Zapper Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Ground-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu.  You can get a Zapper Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Raichu Hair, a Raichu Card, and a Raichu Crest. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
